headline: Here's Why You Should Retain American International Stock for Now
summary: AIG remains well-poised for growth on the back of strong retention rates in the General Insurance segment. Divestitures and cost-cutting initiatives drive margins.

headline: AIG Appoints Christopher Flatt Global Chief Underwriting Officer
summary: NEW YORK, January 09, 2025--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that Christopher Flatt, currently Head of AIG North America Alternative Channels, has been named Global Chief Underwriting Officer, effective immediately. Mr. Flatt will report directly to Peter Zaffino, Chairman & Chief Executive Officer, AIG and join the company’s Executive Leadership Team.
